questions.question_text: In which two ways has digitization transformed today's security threat landscape? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
"Reinforce their threat-centric security tactics." and "Complement threat-centric tactics with trust-centric methods."

questions.question_text: In which two ways should companies modernize their security philosophies? (Choose two.)

choices.B: Complement threat-centric tactics with trust-centric methods
choices.A: Rebuild their security portfolios with new solutions
